name: Greenpeace
description: A global environmental organization focused on worldwide issues such as climate change, deforestation, and overfishing.

name: World Wildlife Fund (WWF)
description: An international non-governmental organization working in the field of the wilderness preservation and the reduction of human impact on the environment.

name: Natural Resources Defense Council (NRDC)
description: An environmental advocacy group that works to safeguard the Earth, its people, its plants and animals, and the natural systems on which all life depends.
